modName: Custom Armored Standalone Follower - Ameera The Fox
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150112/cr4pg726.png[/img]
[center]I Deleted most of the stuff on this Page, so that it doesnt look like a "Myspace" Page anymore.
I like cute gifs, i wanted to show of my creativity with my Artwork, and i thougt its lore friendly to put the description in a Letter that looks like its "Medieval" written. Sorry i put such a lot of work and love in detail to this Modpage.[/center]
[center][/center][center][size=4]Location : She Is at Anises Cabin. She uses A Copy of Astrids "Blade of Woe". Have Fun. -_-
[/size][img]http://fs2.directupload.net/images/150115/pw537qbg.jpg[/img][/center][center][/center][center]
This Mod has been hard work, long evenings, and this Mod Page was done with love and much Time spent on Gimp. 
Body Type : UNP Base
SG Texture Renewal[/center][center][youtube]cjE_Lpcou7U[/youtube][youtube]1uDDBcaUYCA[/youtube]

[img]http://24.media.tumblr.com/8d829ad5d894138ffeabe3aca8d91314/tumblr_mibzbiwKqr1qgxjxqo1_500.gif[/img][/center][img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150118/84fitgwc.png[/img]
[center]

[size=5]Thanks to
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5134496/?]Shockero[/url], you are the Best! Thank you, without you i would have needed Years to realize my Vision of this Fox Themed Armor Concept!  <3[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/69377/?]Grace Darkling[/url], for letting me Use your "Riften Fall" Fox Retexture included in your [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22726/?]Awesome Animal Pack[/url].

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393/?]HelloSanta[/url], For Awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Body Textures[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]Eyebrows[/url].

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]tktk1[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url], helping Ugly Characters getting Pretty Since - Whenever. <3

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]Expired6978[/url] for Updating the Awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url].
